title: Bard in store by accident?
body:
Because I just bought him and it took my ip and didn't give me bard, http://prntscr.com/6ftzok

and  http://prntscr.com/6fu070


It has the option to buy him... even though i just bought him, give me bard or my Ip back please.

replies.body: Strange, I have bard not complaining though, looks like  i don't have to contact support.

i bought him early this morning. he had no splash at the time. so i thought maybe when they patch in the morning. that will be fixed. no dint get bard. it took my ip and he is in my purchase history.
anyone know how to fix
Why would you buy him when the patch isn't out yet?
I thought they might of released him early.
